home.typeWriterPT2: Here you will know a little about me

about.title: About me
about.introduction: I'Am a Creative Web Designer And Developer
about.introduction_text: I'm Lais. I'm a junior full stack web developer at the company I've been working for 4 years. My favorite part of the job is the frontend and web design. I like to work in the area of ​​programming and also in the area of ​​design and visual communication.

interests_and_hobbies.title: Interests and Hobbies
interests_and_hobbies.description: I highlight some hobbies and interests that I have and practice!

programming.title: Programming
programming.description: I like to program something I have in mind in my spare time, it makes me expand my knowledge in the area.

anime.title: Anime
anime.description: I like to watch anime and read manga, I really admire Japanese culture especially their animations.

cosplay.title: Cosplay
cosplay.description: Whenever I can, I like to dress up as a character I love.

create.title: Create
create.description: I always chose to create models, drawings, characters, etc. of my own creation rather than using one that already exists.

drawing.title: Drawing
drawing.description: As my main hobby, I love to draw. A few years ago I migrated to digital drawing, because before that I had several sketchbooks full of drawings and drafts.

edit.title: Edit
edit.description: I've always loved editing photos, putting together banners and folders in editing programs, especially PhotoShop.

games.title: Games
games.description: I always look for a good game when I get home from work to relax. Games are things that give me pleasure.

piano.title: Piano
piano.description: I like to play the piano and the guitar, but mainly the piano. When I touch him, I always feel immense peace.

read.title: Read
read.description: I love reading science fiction books, it always opens my mind to a world full of imagination!

writing.title: Writing
writing.description: I love to write my own books and poems, create my own characters and post them for people to notice the most amazing things I could achieve in my imagination!

formacoes.title: ETEC de Sapopemba
formacoes.descricao: I graduated as a Computer Technician at the ETEC Technical School in Sapopemba. I learned several areas of computing, from hardware (computer assembly, networks and infrastructure) to software (web and desktop programming, databases and mobile applications

formacoes.title: SAGA
formacoes.descricao: I was curious to understand how the game design part works and I did a workshop on the SAGA art school and I really liked how the creation and development of games works through the Unreal Engine platform.

formacoes.title: UNINOVE
formacoes.descricao: I decided to start college in the computing area and pursue a professional career in IT. I'm developing and improving skills in infrastructure, but mainly programming.

formacoes.title: CISCO Academy
formacoes.descricao: In one of the semesters at UNINOVE, I took a course on Computer Networks at the CISCO Academy, which added knowledge in networks and helped me with the support where I worked at the time.

formacoes.title: CISCO Academy
formacoes.descricao: In one of the semesters at UNINOVE, I took a course on Information Security at the CISCO academy, which helped me to be more aware of systems security and to apply what I had learned in the development of my projects.
